explains: v. 骚扰；不断攻击（敌人）

sentences.en: He has sent hither swarms of officers to harass our people.
sentences.cn: 他派遣大批官员到这里骚扰我们的人民。

sentences.en: Governments have been known to snoop on and harass innocent citizens in the past.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，政府过去一直监视和侵扰无辜市民。

sentences.en: We've got a few small Green Peace boats that we harass the dumping ship with.
sentences.cn: 我们有几艘 Green Peace 的船只，用来侵扰那艘倾倒垃圾的船。
